home.title: Give gifts that tell a story
home.subtitle: Personalize every detail for memories that last.

about.title: About Us
about.founderInfo: where every gift is a true work of art, created with passion, care, and a unique personal touch. Founded by
about.handmadeProducts: Every item we offer is handmade, with special attention to detail, to ensure that each gift is not only beautiful but also meaningful. We believe that personalized gifts are more than just objects: they are messages, emotions, and memories carried in the heart.
about.commitment: Our commitment is simple: to offer you handmade creations, full of care and passion, so you can give moments of happiness to those you love. Whether it’s for a birthday, wedding, birth, or any other special occasion, we strive to make every moment even more unique and memorable.
about.thankYou: Thank you for being part of this craft adventure. Each order is a new opportunity for us to share our passion and bring a bit of magic into your daily gestures.

footer.title: The Perfect Gift
footer.copyright: The Perfect Gift. All rights reserved.

product_list.description: Give more than a gift, create an emotion. Explore our collection of personalized gifts for every occasion and every special person. Every detail is designed to turn your memories into unforgettable moments, because the best gifts are those that tell a story.
